Key_Risks: High return fraud, Complex defect identification, Software vs hardware issues
Mitigation_Strategy: Strict verification (IMEI/Serial), Replacement preferred over refund, Service center network
Refund_Value_Policy: Full product value refund; Priority processing for items >₹50K; Enhanced verification for fraud prevention
Special_Conditions: Factory reset, No liquid damage, All accessories

Key_Risks: Safety compliance, BIS certification, Child safety liability
Mitigation_Strategy: BIS verification mandatory, Quick replacement for safety defects, Processing fees for returns
Refund_Value_Policy: Full refund if safety standards not met; Expedited processing for child safety concerns
Special_Conditions: BIS labels intact, Safety seals unbroken, Original warnings present

Categories: Beauty products, Health supplements, Baby care
Key_Risks: Hygiene contamination, Consumable items, Health regulations
Mitigation_Strategy: Non-returnable policy for consumables, Sealed package requirements
Refund_Value_Policy: No refund if seal broken; Full refund only for unopened/defective items; Store credit option available
Special_Conditions: Unopened seals, No tampering, Expiry date validity

Key_Risks: Installation issues, Motor warranty, Power compatibility
Mitigation_Strategy: Extended replacement window, Separate motor warranty, Installation guidance
Refund_Value_Policy: Full refund if replacement unavailable; Installation charges refunded separately; Pro-rated for used items
Special_Conditions: No installation attempted, All manuals included, Unused condition

Key_Risks: Size/fit issues, Preference-based returns, Normal wear claims
Mitigation_Strategy: Standard return windows, Clear condition requirements, Size guides
Refund_Value_Policy: Full refund as per standard policy; Store credit faster than bank refund; Preference-based returns allowed
Special_Conditions: Original tags, Unworn condition, Original packaging
